metadata.title: CVE-2019-16249 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: OpenCV 4.1.1 has an out-of-bounds read in hal_baseline::v_load in core/hal/intrin_sse.hpp when called from computeSSDMeanNorm in modules/video/src/dis_flow.cpp.

criterions.comment: opencv package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
